channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A cellular absolute motivic ring spectrum representing Hermitian K-theory
item.description: arXiv:2411.14857v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Several candidates for a motivic spectrum representing hermitian K-theory in the Morel-Voevodsky motivic stable homotopy category over schemes in which 2 is not necessarily invertible exist. This note shows that the cellular absolute motivic spectrum constructed in the thesis of the first author via the geometry of orthogonal and hyperbolic Grassmannians over any scheme coincides with the motivic ring spectrum constructed recently by Calm\`es, Harpaz, and Nardin.
item.dc:creator: K. Arun Kumar, Oliver R\"ondigs

item.title: $L^p$-coarse Baum--Connes conjecture for $\ell^{q}$-coarse embeddable spaces
item.description: arXiv:2411.15070v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We prove an $L^p$-version of the coarse Baum--Connes conjecture for spaces that coarsely embedds into $\ell^q$-spaces for any $p$ and $q$ in $[1,\infty)$.
item.dc:creator: Jinmin Wang, Zhizhang Xie, Guoliang Yu, Bo Zhu

item.title: Perfect complexes and completion
item.description: arXiv:2411.14761v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Let $\hat{R}$ be the $I$-adic completion of a commutative ring $R$ with respect to a finitely generated ideal $I$. We give a necessary and sufficient criterion for the category of perfect complexes over $\hat{R}$ to be equivalent to the subcategory of dualizable objects in the derived category of $I$-complete complexes of $R$-modules. Our criterion is always satisfied when $R$ is noetherian. When specialized to $R$ local and noetherian and to $I$ the maximal ideal, our theorem recovers a recent result of Benson, Iyengar, Krause and Pevtsova.
item.dc:creator: Paul Balmer, Beren Sanders
